Package com.medilabo.microfront.service

Class PatientService

java.lang.Object
com.medilabo.microfront.service.PatientService
@Service public class PatientService extends Object
Service class for managing patients and interacting with external services using WebClient. Provides methods to fetch, update, validate, and delete patients, handling common exceptions such as patient not found and patient already exists.

  • Method Details

    • fetchPatients

      public List<PatientBean> fetchPatients(String token)
      Fetches a list of all patients.
      Parameters:
      token - Authorization token for the request.
      Returns:
      List of PatientBean objects representing the patients.

    • fetchPatientById

      public PatientBean fetchPatientById(long id, String token)
      Fetches a patient by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the patient to be fetched.
      token - Authorization token for the request.
      Returns:
      The PatientBean object for the specified patient.
      Throws:
      PatientNotFoundException - if the patient is not found.

    • updatePatient

      public PatientBean updatePatient(long id, PatientBean patient, String token)
      Updates the details of an existing patient by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the patient to be updated.
      patient - The PatientBean object containing the updated details.
      token - Authorization token for the request.
      Returns:
      The updated PatientBean object.
      Throws:
      PatientNotFoundException - if the patient is not found.
      PatientAlreadyExistsException - if a patient with the same name and birthdate already exists.

    • validatePatient

      public PatientBean validatePatient(PatientBean patient, String token)
      Validates and adds a new patient if they don't already exist.
      Parameters:
      patient - The PatientBean object to be validated.
      token - Authorization token for the request.
      Returns:
      The validated PatientBean object.
      Throws:
      PatientAlreadyExistsException - if a patient with the same name and birthdate already exists.

    • deletePatientById

      public void deletePatientById(long id, String token)
      Deletes a patient by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the patient to be deleted.
      token - Authorization token for the request.
      Throws:
      PatientNotFoundException - if the patient is not found.
